Class PlayerDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.PlayerDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlayerDeck extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the deck of playable cards for a player.

    • addCard

      public void addCard(PlayableCard[] newCard) throws DeckFullException
      Adds a new card to the mini deck if there is space available.
      Parameters:
      newCard - The new card to be added to the mini deck.
      Throws:
      DeckFullException - If the deck is already full and cannot accommodate more cards.

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard(int pos) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Removes a card from the mini deck at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the card to be removed.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the position is out of range (pos invalid input: '<' 0 || pos >= miniDeck.size()).
